originalText.text: I enjoyed the vast selection of herbs and supplements. They have a very good juice bar as well. The customer service is sincere, legitimate and intentional. I will come here for all my needs in the gym and preventative medicinal practices.

text.text: I enjoyed the vast selection of herbs and supplements. They have a very good juice bar as well. The customer service is sincere, legitimate and intentional. I will come here for all my needs in the gym and preventative medicinal practices.

originalText.text: Great service all around. They have a variety of dried herbs for my crafts which I appreciate. The workers are always friendly lending a helping hand with a smile. Delicious smoothies, natural supplements and essential oils. Such a great selection of items.

text.text: Great service all around. They have a variety of dried herbs for my crafts which I appreciate. The workers are always friendly lending a helping hand with a smile. Delicious smoothies, natural supplements and essential oils. Such a great selection of items.

originalText.text: Excellent products.. super customer service and one of the best hidden juice and smoothie bars in Harlem. Everyone should support this business and use their products. They make a wicked sea moss as well.....

text.text: Excellent products.. super customer service and one of the best hidden juice and smoothie bars in Harlem. Everyone should support this business and use their products. They make a wicked sea moss as well.....

originalText.text: The staff member recommended a detox beverage to me that he said was safe for pregnant women but upon further investigation I discovered that it was not recommended for use during pregnancy and had I taken it, it could have possibly caused a miscarriage. Instead of being understanding of my fear the owner tried to justify it by telling me the makers of the product didn’t know what they were talking about and made it seem like it was my fault I was given the wrong information by his staff member. I do not like the lack of accountability. We all make mistakes, but when your staff member gives me information that could have possibly killed my unborn baby I expect understanding not excuses. I trusted them to be knowledgeable about their products and to warn me about possible side effects, the consequences of what could’ve happened really disturbs me.

originalText.text: I just ordered for the first time from this place (off Uber Eats) and got a BYO fruit salad bowl and BYO smoothie (with strawberry, mango, pineapple, raspberry) and the fruit in both is. so. fresh. I am REALLY pleased b/c I live for a good, fresh smoothie, and many smoothie places I've tried near where I live/work will use fruit that tastes a bit past its expiration date, and it really makes a difference in flavor to me (and texture, honestly). My only suggestion would be for them to offer the option to NOT do any kind of liquid base for the smoothies. My preferred smoothie is milk- and liquid base-free, so that it is completely fruit based and REALLY thick in consistency. That way I can have the smoothie like a morning/lunch meal replacement (along with nuts or greek yogurt, etc for protein). That aside, will def order from them again if they are on Uber Eats/Seamless/Doordash etc next time I'm looking for a smoothie.
